data.text: @MerlinofCanada And please pull up the stats of how many daily deaths of diabetes, heart disease and obesity related death while your at it ..betcha the numbers are of a magnitude of 10x covid deaths and noone is panicking

@danceswflamingo @MerlinofCanada @2nd_leigh What’s insane is in the last 62 days 700 people have died and it’s like no one cares. To them it is a small price to pay to not have the “inconvenience” of a mask.
@BrandieHarrop @MerlinofCanada @2nd_leigh In 2 months, 700 people have died. That’s insane
@MerlinofCanada @2nd_leigh If learning to live with Covid means accepting that 80-100 people are going die a week every week I would rather not.
@MerlinofCanada @angiereid Sounds like a propaganda test balloon.  When are Albertans going to wake up??  Kenney is literally killing you off and you just take it? Wtf 🤬

@MerlinofCanada @JanineRutledge Another health expert now, just another mouth for the wicked group of women that represent change of life in the NDP party. Hot and Cold flashes have now become climate change.
